metadata.synopsis: Pete Rose (Tom Sizemore) becomes one of baseball's greatest players, but gambling on games leads to his banishment from the sport.

reviews: [Sizemore's] performance can best be summed up as Al Pacino by way of Moe from The Three Stooges.
Perhaps one day someone will make a truly even-keeled movie about the life of Pete Rose ... but this flick doesn't even come close.
Sizemore beira perigosamente a caricatura, enquanto Bogdanovich conduz a narrativa de forma tristemente burocrtica. Ainda assim,  uma boa histria.
